review.reviewBody: REALLY Great food,  but I would appreciate if they would start properly sealing the bags with tape or staples :( it's a little worrisome that they don't do anything to make the bags tamper proof.
Great pastries, satisfyingly crunchy and chewy.  I loved the ham and cheese.   Definitely give this a try.
The cro-tai are generally very good. However, they gave me cinnamon instead of blueberry, and I even specified to have refund if not available.

I really enjoyed the regular 24 piece stuffies box filled with custard and cherry flavoured pastries. However, the egg and cheese filled pastry was not my favourite. The cheese tasted like Kraft singles, no flavour honestly. I expected a better cheese to go with the egg. Overall I like the store, just won't order the egg and cheese item.
